item.title: EP 141 - The Marilyn Monroe/UFO Connection
item.itunes:title: The Marilyn Monroe/UFO Connection
item.description:
Today we meet the unluckiest man ever, take a ride on a phantom train, and then we explore the conspiracy theory that Marilyn Monroe was killed to cover up her knowledge of UFOs.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 
https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Frane Selak was just a normal man who wanted to live a normal life. But Fate had other plans . . .

Then we travel to Arizona where a ghost train plows across the desert. Where is it from and more importantly, where is it going?

And finally we go back to that fateful night when Marilyn Monroe died. Was it a suicide? Or was it a cover-up to keep her from revealing that we are not alone in the universe.

Links:

Frane Selak

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frane_Selak

Ghost Stories: The Haunted Desert

https://www.desertusa.com/desert-people/haunted-deserts.html

Shadow Train

http://americanfolklore.net/folklore/2010/07/the_shadow_train.html

Haunted Places in Arizona

https://exemplore.com/paranormal/haunted-places-in-arizona

New documentary claims UFOs were responsible for Marilyn Monroe’s death

http://www.thinkaboutit-ufos.com/new-documentary-claims-ufos-responsible-marilyn-monroes-death/

Marilyn Monroe UFO Document

http://www.thinkaboutit-ufos.com/marilyn-monroe-ufo-document/

The Marilyn Monroe CIA Memo

http://www.blackmesapress.com/page4.htm

URECAT - UFO Related Entities Catalog

http://ufologie.patrickgross.org/ce3/1955-05-23-uk.htm

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
